duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage highway construction projects in cold climates, with a focus on MDT experience and compliance.
Evaluate project costs, create and review project schedules, and ensure site compliance and safety.
Read and interpret blueprints for effective project execution.
Oversee excavation and land development for civil construction projects.
Utilize strong verbal, written, and organizational skills to drive project success.
Collaborate with team members and stakeholders to achieve project goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management or Civil Engineering (preferred)
